patthana16.5:4.1: Kusalaṃ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.5:4.2: Kusalaṃ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.5:4.3: Kusalaṃ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca naabyākato nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.5:6.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana16.5:7.1: Kusalaṃ hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.5:7.2: Kusalaṃ hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.5:7.3: Kusalaṃ hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca naabyākato nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.5:8.1: Akusalaṃ hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … tīṇi.
patthana16.5:8.5: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
